```{r echo=FALSE}
library(reticulate)
use_condaenv("base")
```

```{r eval=FALSE}
library(reticulate) # Use python 3
py_install("wptools")
```

```{r }
wptools <- import("wptools")
page <- wptools$page("Lake Peipsi")
res <- page$get_parse()$data["infobox"]
knitr::kable(tidyr::gather(purrr::flatten_df(res)))
```
